en.title: How to Name Your Cat: 2025 Popular Rankings and Naming Tips
en.content:
Choosing a name for your new family member is the most enjoyable part of preparing to welcome a cat. Here are some naming tips and popular names by category.

3 Tips for Choosing a Name

1. Short names with 2 to 3 syllables are easier for cats to remember (e.g., "Mugi," "Leo"). 2. Choose a name that the whole family finds easy to call and likes. 3. Drawing inspiration from your cat's appearance (coat color, body type) or personality makes the name feel more personal.

Popular Names by Category

Japanese Names

Mugi, Kinako, Mochi, Tsukushi, Hana, Sakura, Azuki, Yuzu, Koharu, Suzu, Hinata, Sora

Western Names

Leo, Luna, Belle, Coco, Marron, Mel, Noah, Milk, Mocha, Latte, Olive, Jasmine

Food-Inspired Names

Kinako, Mochi, Choco, Marron, Azuki, Pudding, Mint, Ponzu, Kurumi, Mame

Names that Suit Siberians

Names of Russian origin are a perfect fit for Siberians: Misha, Natasha, Sasha, Nikita, Yuri, Alyosha, and more. Snow-themed names (Yuki, Shiro, Snow, Ice) are also popular.

zh.title: 猫咪取名攻略：2025年人气排行榜与命名技巧
zh.content:
为新家庭成员取名，是迎接猫咪准备中最令人愉快的环节。以下按类别介绍猫咪取名技巧和人气名字。

取名3大技巧

①2至3个音节的短名字更容易让猫咪记住（如“Mugi”“Leo”等）。②选择全家人都好叫、都喜欢的名字。③从猫咪的外貌（毛色、体型）或性格中获取灵感，更容易产生亲切感。

各类别人气名字

日式名字

Mugi、Kinako、Mochi、Tsukushi、Hana、Sakura、Azuki、Yuzu、Koharu、Suzu、Hinata、Sora

西式名字

Leo、Luna、Belle、Coco、Marron、Mel、Noah、Milk、Mocha、Latte、Olive、Jasmine

食物系名字

Kinako、Mochi、Choco、Marron、Azuki、Pudding、Mint、Ponzu、Kurumi、Mame

适合西伯利亚猫的名字

源自俄语的名字非常适合西伯利亚猫：Misha、Natasha、Sasha、Nikita、Yuri、Alyosha等。与雪有关的名字（Yuki、Shiro、Snow、Ice）也很受欢迎。
